memberdef.name: resize

briefdescription.para: Add a link the user uses to open the comments popup.

memberdef.name: opts
memberdef.initializer: = { processVoteURL: '/_process_vote', addCommentURL: '/_add_comment', getCommentsURL: '/_get_comments', acceptCommentURL: '/_accept_comment', deleteCommentURL: '/_delete_comment', commentImage: '/static/_static/comment.png', closeCommentImage: '/static/_static/comment-close.png', loadingImage: '/static/_static/ajax-loader.gif', commentBrightImage: '/static/_static/comment-bright.png', upArrow: '/static/_static/up.png', downArrow: '/static/_static/down.png', upArrowPressed: '/static/_static/up-pressed.png', downArrowPressed: '/static/_static/down-pressed.png', voting: false, moderator: false }

briefdescription.para: Set comp, which is a comparator function used for sorting and inserting comments into the list.

detaileddescription.para: If the user has preferences stored in the sortBy cookie, use those, otherwise use the default.

briefdescription.para: Perform an ajax request to get comments for a node and insert the comments into the comments tree.
Add a comment via ajax and insert the comment into the comment tree.
Recursively append comments to the main comment list and children lists, creating the comment tree.
After adding a new comment, it must be inserted in the correct location in the comment tree.
Handle when the user clicks on a sort by link.
Function to process a vote when a user clicks an arrow.
Open a reply form used to reply to an existing comment.
Close the reply form opened with openReply.
Recursively sort a tree of comments using the comp comparator.
Get the children comments from a ul.

detaileddescription.para: If recursive is true, recursively include childrens' children.

briefdescription.para: Create a div to display a comment in.

detaileddescription.para: Placeholders such as <id%> are replaced by context['id'] with items being escaped. Placeholders such as <#id#> are not escaped.
